dataList.content: Episode S0_8
We’re here. Charon knew the way all along.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: No, no you didn’t! Sinclair and I had to steer you from both sides nonstop.
I’m glad that at least you learned to tell the difference between southeast and northeast, Charon.
<So this is… the old L Corp?>
This is my first time seeing it with my own eyes, too… It can’t have been long since ‘that’ happened.
My goodness… How can a building be in such a derelict state?
Hah, this is a surprising scene for our rich boy, is it.
Cut the chatter. Time to step off.
<Huh, there are people over there…>
They’re Fixers from the same Office as Miss Yuri.
They’re experienced explorers who have visited the branches of L Corp. a number of times.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Give your greetings. The person on the left is Hopkins, and the one on the right is Aya.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Greetings~

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Th… The… The—

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: The Red Gaze! It’s—it’s such an honor to meet you…! I’ve heard so many stories of your deeds, and to see you in person…

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Myeah.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: See the shabby warehouse there? That’s where the stairs leading down to the branch facility are.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: From there, Yuri here will be your guide.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: …Yeah.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: These Fixers have been around a bit. Count on them to handle complications.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: That should be enough, yeah? This is as far as I can accompany you. I’ll be waiting back at the bus.
<Huh? Wait, what?>

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: You’re sorely mistaken if you expect me to babysit you forever, Dante.
So you’ll take a back seat and idle away all alone?

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: If I get myself involved, the expedition would be a little too free of challenge, wouldn’t it? It’d turn into more of a tour.
…In other words, you want us to come back red, black, and blue.
That’s the kind of line people with ulterior motives say…

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: Think whatever you want.

dataList.title: Guide
dataList.content: I’ve gotten you guides and everything, so do your best down there.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Yes! I certainly won’t disappoint you, Mister Red Gaze!

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll try my best, I think~
